description: The power state constants have ended up duplicated following a bad merge.  They were moved from nova.compute.node.Instance into nova.compute.power_state at the same time that Instance was moved into nova.compute.service.  We've ended up with these constants in both places.
title: Duplicated power state constants

comments.content: The power state constants have ended up duplicated following a bad merge.  They were moved from nova.compute.node.Instance into nova.compute.power_state at the same time that Instance was moved into nova.compute.service.  We've ended up with these constants in both places.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ewanmellor
